title: Tropfest 2004
creator_credit: Abby Hunt, Sydney Morning Herald, HOST and Scott Pickett
brief_description: Tropfest is the world’s largest short film festival, held one night in February each year at the Domain, Royal Botanic Gardens, Sydney. The aim is to showcase work from young and emerging filmmakers, providing them with a festival atmosphere to screen their works to peers. This disc contains the sixteen 2004 finalists, the Awards Ceremony and Tips for budding filmmakers.
